00028 #include "qf_pkg.h"
00029 #include "qassert.h"

00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qf_gc)

00037 //............................................................................
00038 void QF::gc(QEvent const *e) {
00039     if (e->dynamic_ != (uint8_t)0) {                 // is it a dynamic event?
00040         QF_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00041         QF_INT_LOCK_();
00042 
00043         if ((e->dynamic_ & 0x3F) > 1) {      // isn't this the last reference?
00044 
00045             //lint -e1773                           Attempt to cast away const
00046             --((QEvent *)e)->dynamic_;      // decrement the reference counter
00047                    // NOTE: cast the 'const' away, which is legitimate because
00048                    // it's a dynamic event
00049 
00050             QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QF_GC_ATTEMPT, (void *)0, (void *)0)
00051                 QS_TIME_();                                       // timestamp
00052                 QS_SIG_(e->sig);                    // the signal of the event
00053                 QS_U8_(e->dynamic_);    // the dynamic attributes of the event
00054             QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00055 
00056             QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00057         }
00058         else {         // this is the last reference to this event, recycle it
00059             uint8_t idx = (uint8_t)((e->dynamic_ >> 6) - 1);
00060 
00061             QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QF_GC, (void *)0, (void *)0)
00062                 QS_TIME_();                                       // timestamp
00063                 QS_SIG_(e->sig);                    // the signal of the event
00064                 QS_U8_(e->dynamic_);    // the dynamic attributes of the event
00065             QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00066 
00067             QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00068 
00069             Q_ASSERT(idx < QF_maxPool_);
00070 
00071             //lint -e1773                           Attempt to cast away const
00072             QF_EPOOL_PUT_(QF_pool_[idx], (QEvent *)e);   // cast 'const' away,
00073                              // which is legitimate, because it's a pool event
00074         }
00075     }
00076 }
